game.name: Mind Faux: The First Compliance
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Mind Faux: The First Compliance is a puzzle game that test your problem solving skills. What is the purpose of these mysterious tests? You try to figure out how to escape a maze of misinformation. Or you can comply with the voice that is guiding you along.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Mind Faux: The First Compliance is a puzzle game that test your problem solving skills. What is the purpose of these mysterious tests? You try to figure out how to escape a maze of misinformation. Or you can comply with the voice that is guiding you along.
